name: Enfilading Fire
text: Your ranged attacks take advantage of the flanking maneuvers of allies.
prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, one other teamwork feat.
benefit: You receive a +2 bonus on ranged attacks made against a foe flanked by 1 or more allies with this feat.
staminaText: Before making a ranged attack roll, you can spend 1 stamina point to gain the benefits of this feat against a target that is flanked by two or more allies, even if those allies don’t have this feat.
text_zh: 透过盟友的夹击，你在射击时得到额外的优势。
prerequisites_zh: 近距射击，精准射击，至少一项团队专长。
benefit_zh: 当至少一个拥有此专长的盟友夹击敌人时，你对该目标的远程攻击得到+2加值。
staminaText_zh: 在每次攻击前，只要花费1点耐力，即使夹击的盟友不拥有团队专长你也可享受该专长的效果
